name: Crush Landing
description:
Crush Landing is a game developed for GGJ 2020 using GB Studio. It is about Bob, a guy with a broken heart, who tries to help a handsome alien repair his ship after a crash. In this nostalgic GameBoy adventure, Bob navigates his town to collect parts. He helps fix a spaceship and mends his broken heart in the arms of his dreamy alien crush.

The game is developed for the GameBoy and you can run the .rom file on a GameBoy emulator of your choosing.  And if you are feeling extra, you can even run it on an actual GameBoy!

If all that sounds like too much work, don't fret! Head over to this link and enjoy the mobile friendly web version of the game!

Created by: anilanil, gocivici, & miraycolakoglu
